word: In this way men at the heart of the work have been acting. But to whom are they responsible for their reason and ability. "As I live by the Father, so he that eateth me shall live by me." Unless those who are connected with the work of God bring the words of Christ into their every day practice, they will see something at which to be offended, as did the disciples, and will turn away from Christ. "It is the Spirit that quickeneth, the flesh profiteth nothing; the words that I speak unto you, they are spirit, and they are life."
